duties_responsibilities.duty: Reviewing and facilitating the patient financial process during intake calls.
Discussing estimated patient financial responsibility with patients/families and collecting upfront payments.
Working with guarantors on payment plans and ensuring completion of necessary account processes.
Assisting patients with hardships and obtaining supporting documentation.
Following up on payment plans and reviewing accounts to ensure accuracy.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Healthcare, or related field (Master's preferred)
